name: Space Station Delta: A Roguelike Adventure
name_original: Space Station Delta: A Roguelike Adventure
description: Space Station Delta is a one-man passion project after seeing the lack of classic roguelikes on the market. The randomly generated maps, turn-based combat, and grid-based movement make it a fun strategy game with lots of potential. It is a short adventure, taking around 30 minutes to complete, though it will be an enjoyable 30 minutes. The boss fights are a fun change up, and the music is pretty good also. (If I do say so myself)
